title: Textile, 1785–95
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 161.3 x 71.1cm (63 1/2 x 28 in.)
Repeat H: 83.8 cm (33 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Large scale design of a woody vine with exotic flowers, parrots and smaller birds, in shades of brown, tan, rose, red, blue, and faded violet on an off-white ground.  Fine picotage around parrot's eyes. Right selvedge present.

tombstone.epitaph:

1785–95. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1953-19-3-a,b.
